alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 6:08AM EST until January 10 at 11:30PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Barrow and Jackson Counties. For the Middle Oconee River...including Auburn, Winder, Arcade, Athens...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Middle Oconee River near Arcade. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Significant flooding occurs in the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage at Georgia Highway 82. A residential yard will be completely flooded with the water reaching the foundation of a house just downstream. The flood waters will be reaching Bismarck Circle Road upstream from the gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was was estimated to be around 22 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest around 22 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.6 feet on 12/17/1992. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued at 300 PM EST.this evening at 615 PM EST.
